Title: Establishes city community improvement projects
Summary: Allows property owners to petition for city community improvement projects involving local improvements to shared driveways and sewer systems.
LawCode: Add Title 25 Chap 5-A §§25-501 - 25-516, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to establishing city community improvement projects
